title: WTB/WTTF many T207 commons - list included
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF many T207 commons - list included
posts.post_content:
Down to about 85 cards needed for my T207 set. Most are Broadleaf/Cycle, but still need a bunch of Recruit or Napoleon backed cards - list is below.

Looking to buy or trade for these in lower condition (P, F, G, possibly VG, depending on price). Please let me know what you might have - thanks.

If you prefer to trade, I have T205, T206, and T207 commons available if you prefer that.

Block
Drake
Easterly
Ellis
Engle
Evans
George
Graham
Graney
Hagerman
Kling
Krause
Duffy Lewis
Matty McIntyre
Mullin
Nunamaker
Oakes
Schardt
Scott
Thomas
Wagner
Zeider

posts.post_title: Re: WTB/WTTF many T207 commons - list included
posts.post_content: I believe I have a few here: [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/t205t207.html[/url]

Hi Ed - hope you're well.

I actually had already previously checked your page. Unfortunately it looks like the ones I need you have in the rarer Anonymous back. I'm looking for only the recruit backs so those are more in my range.

But thank you for reaching out - much appreciated.

[quote name="edhans" post=1594936]I believe I have a few here: [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/t205t207.html[/url][/QUOTE]

posts.post_title: Re: WTB/WTTF many T207 commons - list included
posts.post_content: Thanks for visiting my site. Sorry I couldn't help out. BTW, several of the subjects on your list will not be found with Recruit backs. Best of luck in the quest.

[quote name="edhans" post=1595073]Thanks for visiting my site. Sorry I couldn't help out. BTW, several of the subjects on your list will not be found with Recruit backs. Best of luck in the quest.[/QUOTE]

Thanks, Ed -

Looks like I have some Broadleaf/Cycle mixed in there. I'll take those off.
